website_summaries.verdict: This mower is easy to use and store, and comes at a decent price point. It's ideal for modest plots and for people with reduced mobility.
pros: Doesn't take up a lot of space to store, so you can easily keep it in your garage or backyard storage shed
Excellent performance and features for the money
cons: Not the greatest range of cutting heights – only has 5
Cutting deck is only 30-inches, so it will take this mower a while to cut large yards

customer_reviews.title: If you live in an Ethanol state, you don't want this mower! ! !
customer_reviews.text: 8 months after I got it, it quit running. The warranty repair shop blamed it on Ethanol damage. They stated that the manufacturer was aware of the problem, but since less than 5% of their worldwide sales are in ethanol states, it was not worth the effort to correct the problem and it is not covered by warranty! They quoted me 30 days to repair the mower. They had it for 70 days! It cost me $285 to get this mower repaired. I thought troybilt was a good name, I will never buy another of their products!!!
customer_reviews.author: R. Guentner

customer_reviews.title: When changing oil, read the words in Step 4 and ignore Figure 6-1 of the lawnmower manual
customer_reviews.text: The lawnmower is fine and we like it, but beware - the illustration for changing the oil is wrong! If you locate the tube as shown on Figure 6-1 of Maintenance & Adjustments of the Operator's Manual, you'll have an incredible mess of used oil. Follow the words in Step 4 to position the 'oil drain sleeve' which says to slide the tube under the oil tube until it contacts the engine. The plastic oil drain sleeve doesn't go on the plug side of the drain tube as shown in Figure 6-1. It goes on engine side. See the attached pictures.
customer_reviews.author: IGUSS

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend
customer_reviews.text: Last year, on at least 5 different occasions it wouldn't start - I would "jiggle" the wires under the seat and eventually it would start. This year, dead as can be - not a "mechanic" and to get to anything underneath is a total pain - removing the battery should be simple..not so much. Back to push mowing (which is fine).
customer_reviews.author: Just Us

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this tractor so I could speed down the street naked and feel the breeze. Not gonna lie, gets the job done very well 😉
customer_reviews.author: Audiophile

customer_reviews.title: Great value, great machine.
customer_reviews.text: Clutch is a little "touchy" have to push slow. I also purchased a roll of "anti skid" tape for steps and put it on the raised spots where your feet are. Also used "JB Weld" to secure the shift knob. Other than these 2 minor fix's, I love this machine. Just wish the "Hydro" model wasn't so expensive. And this tractor will "FLY."
customer_reviews.author: Johneb

customer_reviews.title: Great little mower
customer_reviews.text: Have used the mower twice. Was delivered 4 days after I ordered it, very easy to assemble, ready to mow in less than an hour. The clutch and steering take some getting used to, but if you take it slow, it works fine. The switch to keep the blades running in reverse is a great feature. The size of this mower is perfect for my 1 acre lot, fits through the gates, easily mows around all the trees and shrubs.
customer_reviews.author: Jim and Marie Iverson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the job (1.35 Acre Property)
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, I thought it might be a bit of work but was glad I did not pay for the expert assembly option. Just put a few pieces of plastic molding in place and bolt the steering wheel and seat together. It mows great, and it is all we need for out 1.35 acre property. I was a bit worried that it would be undersized but it really gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Houlihan

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Got lastnight. Used today for first time today. VERY NICE! Took a little time to put together. Seat, steering, etc....Ran good, cut good and steering is great. Ask several lawn mower repair guys what is best. For property with a little bit rougher grass with weeds this or the craftsman version are the best. To start cut at three then come down to shorter cut. Bigger xommercial mowers cut soft grass only. Like golf course.
customer_reviews.author: Marie A. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Metal Part Broke in first 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this a month back and it started good but kept making grinding/rubbing noises till a metal part on the pulley broke off. (picture attached). And I mow very carefully thru plain grass yard. Now I am stuck with a defective mower. Not sure if anyone else had the same issue. Trying to contact Amazon and Troy Bilt to take care,I will report an update soon.
customer_reviews.author: Yama4

customer_reviews.title: TB 30 review
customer_reviews.text: had to lengthen the shifter rod andi get used to the controls. couldn't drop the deck lower than #3 or it would scalp the grass other than that it's a great mower for the money. Also slow speed {1} could be a lot slower
customer_reviews.author: zirado

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I love the riding lawn mower. It operates and mows well. It is the appropriate size for my small lot. Starts easily and started right out of the crate. I have had no mechanical problems with the mower. I am very happy with the mower. The only problem I have had with the mower is that it arrived with a blown front tire. The tire has been replaced and my account has been credited for the cost of a new tire. My experience with amazon.com service rep was very pleasant and to my complete satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: Charles P. Palmer, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Nice little machine.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the tractor about six months ago and wanted to break it in before I left a review. So far the machine performs exactly like I hoped it would. It was delivered quickly and was easy to put together. I use the bagger and counter weight now that the leaves are falling and it picks everything up. Its fairly speedy with the a low center of gravity but care should be taken around dips and sinkhole if applicable, Also maintain a good air pressure for best results.
customer_reviews.author: mary s fields

customer_reviews.title: Great Mower
customer_reviews.text: I like the way it steers and rides, It Is allot faster than the 3 Snapper Riding Mowers I've owned, but it doesn't cut grass as good, but that Is the Blade. I think If I got a better one that would fix the problem. That could be a problem because It doesn't have a way to stand it up so you can work on the blade.
customer_reviews.author: Linda T. Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Setup was easy (if you follow the instructions) and it started so ...
customer_reviews.text: Got it yesterday and used it once. Seems to work real well. Setup was easy (if you follow the instructions) and it started so fast it surprised me! One area of concern is the mowing deck. You have to be super careful not to step on it or you will knock it out of alignment (I'm assuming). It's a very nice package and I only regret waiting this long.
customer_reviews.author: John M. Carl

customer_reviews.title: I like the looks and size
customer_reviews.text: I like the looks and size, but after it was delivered it, I uncrated it and installed the steering column, seat and some covers. Then when I tried to start it, the motor would only run for a second or two, then stop. It wouldn't start again for a couple of hours. Troy Bilt told me to take it to a local dealer, who wasn't happy that I bought it on-line and expected him to fix it. After a delay of a couple of weeks, I was told that the carb. had to be replaced. A replacement is being ordered and it will be at least another 2 weeks before it can be fixed. Otherwise, I am extremely happy. Bill
customer_reviews.author: Bill Van Hoose

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: I received this lawn mower less than a month ago, it hasn't run long enough to even cut my small yard. It cuts off after just a few minutes and then will not crank back up for several hours. Amazon says I can't return it even though it was delivered less than 30 days ago on June 11.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Phillips

customer_reviews.title: In retrospect it would have been more productive to widen the gate to the backyard.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this mower because it would fit through the backyard gate. Rack and pinion steering is flawed rack wears extremely rapidly to the point that it can no longer be adjusted to maintain engagement ... so now for the happy fun time of getting it warrantied by troy built or square trade.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good mower, delivery date not guaranteed
customer_reviews.text: Great mower, perfect for our yard which is less than an acre. Good turn radius, speed selections, and height selections. Be careful on the delivery dates, scheduled mine on a Friday that I knew I would be off and the trucking company called and said they didn't deliver on Friday and that Amazon knew that. So I had to take an afternoon off on Monday to meet the driver. Besides that headache, pleased with the mower.
customer_reviews.author: M. Morin

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: The steering I too loose. When you turn it's quite difficult to get the steering to catch and turn back as you should. Other than that it's nice. Does the job on my lawn. Just have to accommodate the steering.
customer_reviews.author: Susanne Koster

customer_reviews.title: Good mower
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job of cutting grass. It does a good job of mowing. The discharge chute is made so it does not spread the grass, wants to wind row it which I don't like. Maybe I'll cut a couple of inches off it. Runs good, Plenty of power. I would buy it again. I have had mower for a while now. Sometimes when you first put in in gear it will not move, Have to keep going through the gears to get it it move. My ratings now have gone down some.
customer_reviews.author: noluck

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I really love this lawn mower. I is easy to manuver and fits in small spaces well . I really does the job well when it comes to picking up leaves. I met my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: The mower cuts beautifully. Starting out
customer_reviews.text: The mower cuts beautifully. Starting out, forward or in reverse usually involves a sudden jerk. Occasionally the terrain will cause the mower to over steer. I have occasionally had trouble initiating the "mow in reverse" command. Not sure just why that is. Overall, I am happy, and glad that I bought it. Just the right size for my yard.
customer_reviews.author: gmyers

customer_reviews.title: Just right for my yard
customer_reviews.text: This mower meets my needs perfectly. Just right for maneuvering around the obstacles in my yard, and will be easy to store in my garage. I have little to no experience with riding mowers, so my opinion comes from a limited background. I will say that I like this mower very much and am glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: N. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived and assembled everything. It started but wouldn't go into any gear. Product being returned.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Schirm

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for smaller yards
customer_reviews.text: With it's 30-inch deck, this is the perfect mower for my lawn and the fence gates that it needs to be able to get through. It also does a clean job of cutting and is very maneuverable.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Jager

customer_reviews.title: Not crazy loud and it moves pretty quickly. All in all no complaints
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for mulching leaves and it works very well. Not crazy loud and it moves pretty quickly. All in all no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Price is good. Uses quite a lot of gas
customer_reviews.text: Price is good. Uses quite a lot of gas. Works well if you are going in a straight line, but if you try to mow while turning it gouges the grass pretty good and makes the corners of you lawn look a little poor. It is easy to drive and fairly smooth. It was worth the money for mowing the yard I had.
customer_reviews.author: greg fisher

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Mowing season is over for 2016. Looking forward to using the new mower in 2017.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Davis, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: So far not good. Oct 2016: updated review. Mower was Finally repaired and worked fine. Oct 16, 2016 it stopped running AGAIN.
customer_reviews.text: So far not happy. Not used yet because: The streering function doesn't work. On hold with manufacturer 30min. Finally told that still under warrantee so call local lumber yard which is authorized dealer. No longer the case it turns out. I found another lumber yard farther away. Only has service on Tues and Thurs. I'm told booked up, maybe next week. I am not satisfied so far.
customer_reviews.author: S.O.

customer_reviews.title: your money's worth
customer_reviews.text: we've had this about a month now and there are no complaints. some of the decals are a little crooked; i guess the decal guy was having an off day. it came on a crate and took about 30 minutes to assemble, then about another 30 to install the bagger. it works great and i cannot foresee any big problems coming up. it is a sturdy, usa built product. update: the belt-drive clutch is still grabby, but i guess that is the nature of the device. as the literature advises be very careful on slopes or uneven surfaces-it can be very tippy.
customer_reviews.author: angela friesenborg

customer_reviews.title: Decent lower cost riding mower
customer_reviews.text: Have been using it a few months now. Not as good as a full sized front engine tractor, but doesn't cost as much either. Starts right up, runs great, does the job. No complaints so far. We shall see in a year how it is holding up.
customer_reviews.author: The good, the bad and the ugly

customer_reviews.title: Tight spaces,no problem for this bad boy!
customer_reviews.text: This little mower can really get the job done. Tight spaces are no problem on this bad boy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Make exit chute is on or it will never start good saftey features
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble rides smooth, turning is great for my small yard. Added the grass catcher to it very neat saves time
customer_reviews.author: gary d curry

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal vs Going to a Big-Box store!
customer_reviews.text: Shipped into my Garage. Great mower! Assembly was pretty simple if you are somewhat mechanically inclined. I cut the crating away from the bottom of the pallet it was on and used some boards I had laying around to make two little ramps and rolled the mower off. Very pleased with Amazon and Troy-Built! This mower works best on flat or slightly sloped yards.
customer_reviews.author: Dbosse

customer_reviews.title: Great mower for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I have only mowed with it twice, but I love the operation and the clean cut you get with this machine. I do not have a big lot, less than 17,000 square feet with several large buildings, but I love this machine. Speed is adjustable, height is adjustable, handling is very good, breaks are great, comfortable to mow with (I am 6'5", 235), has a hitch for pulling rakes, spreaders,etc.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Clayton

customer_reviews.title: ... products before purchase and believe this to be the best for me
customer_reviews.text: I researched mower products before purchase and believe this to be the best for me, for the price and product name. Mower came in damaged so returned. Took 1 1/2 weeks for refund. Reordered, keeping my fingers crossed for a good delivery. Customer service was fine. UPDATE: ordered another Troy Built from Amazon, awesome mower!
customer_reviews.author: Steve W.

customer_reviews.title: My only dislike is it has a hard time making it up ...
customer_reviews.text: A well balanced cutting deck. My only dislike is it has a hard time making it up small inclines. Comfortable to ride.
customer_reviews.author: Onemomedic

customer_reviews.title: Great small yard mower
customer_reviews.text: Have now owned this mower 4 yrs and taken good care of it and it runs great and could not e happier with it, may sell next year and get "NEW" unit for warranty protection again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this and it was delivered by a local company right to my garage. I had to put the steering wheel on and the seat...but not hard to figure out. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Brake Clutch combo awkard and jerky.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my elderly father to use on their small yard. Pros: Small size, adjustable deck height, sharp turning, price Cons: I am used to a hydrostatic drive, and the clutch/brake combo is very awkward. It stops suddenly no matter how slow you press it, and it starts with a jerk. My father cannot use the clutch without pushing on it with his heal. He does not feel like he can control the machine and basically won't use it.
customer_reviews.author: RonM

customer_reviews.title: New Red Rider Mower.
customer_reviews.text: Rider mower came in perfect condition. There was assembly needed to ride it but it was not difficult. It is smaller that some other rider mowers but we expected and wanted that. It does a nice job cutting the lawn. The unknown is will it be trouble free over the years of use?
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Z

customer_reviews.title: 30" Riding Mower
customer_reviews.text: Everything I wanted for my small yard! Always mowed with a self propelled 22" mower, but due to age and knee replacement decided I wanted a rider. This mower with its 30" cutting width does all I need it to do. Good product at a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: hardyman

customer_reviews.title: Mower works great for our yard
customer_reviews.text: Mower works great for our yard, real easy to start and operate... the Budge TC-1 Tractor Cover is just right for this mower also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lawn mower.
customer_reviews.text: The mower works very well, even on a somewhat steep section of my lawn. Turning radius is really tight.
customer_reviews.author: senseiyco

customer_reviews.title: A quality product for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put together and very easy to operate. I like having the front of the mower open as this one is because I can see right under my front tires. I also have a steep grade in some of my yard and the automatic choke kicked in some more power climbing up hill which I was happy about. It cut well and turns well. It also moves pretty quickly in 6th gear. A great value!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A lot of mower in a small package
customer_reviews.text: Cuts even and gets through walk-thru gates easily. Plenty of power for average lawns. But the brake/clutch is like everyone says. Very jerky but you can get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: has comfortable seat
customer_reviews.text: great little mower and it is easy to drive and turn.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reading the reviews
customer_reviews.text: Cutest thing on four wheels I use it to mow the yard reading the reviews
customer_reviews.author: Earl The Pearl

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice little tractor for small lawns
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice little tractor for small lawns. I wouldn't recommend his tractor for yards that have any incline. I prefer the 42 inch tractor, which has more stability and gets the job done faster.
customer_reviews.author: JRFella

customer_reviews.title: Love this riding mower
customer_reviews.text: Love this riding mower. Had an issue when it arrived without a battery but Amazon was amazing taking care of it.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Galle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little rider. Not too much to say. Great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Evan E.

customer_reviews.title: Mow in reverse
customer_reviews.text: To those wondering about the 'no mowing in reverse'. My new just delivered 5-4-2016 Troy-Bilt has an override for reverse mowing. It's part of the switch/key operation, just set and go. So far so good and I mow about 1/3 of a suburban acre. Might I add that it beats walkin' . . .
customer_reviews.author: tom h feuhrer

customer_reviews.title: Great for a lot 1/4 acre or smaller
customer_reviews.text: Great for a lot 1/4 acre or smaller. Only set back is it won't cut in reverse. But i knew that prior to purchase. Otherwise easy to operate. Cut my lawn mowing from 2hrs to 30 minutes......
customer_reviews.author: Jaguire89

customer_reviews.title: Hey great little mower!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mower! It has a great turn radius and the delivery driver was superb! It does come on a pallet as others have mentioned but I was able to assemble it and roll it off the pallet in neutral by myself. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Nate Bauman

customer_reviews.title: Mower was received in good condition.
customer_reviews.text: Mower was received in good condition... Assembly was difficult due to its weight...During use in mowing yard, I found that the brake/clutch pedal was extremely touchy...Once the clutch was engaged the mower ran smoothly...Knowing this condition, I probably would not purchase this model mower again...
customer_reviews.author: Robert F. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for 1/4 acre lot.
customer_reviews.text: Have not used yet. Was not expecting the safety sheild to be plastic. Will reveiw as soon as weather permits usage. Like the size.
customer_reviews.author: Al. C.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this late last year and already having to replace the battery
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have used four times now and does everything as ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used four times now and does everything as advertised. Exactly what I had hoped I would be getting. I have a .75 acre yard.
customer_reviews.author: M. Akley

customer_reviews.title: I've yet to find a mower that cuts as high as I'd like. Shipping was flawless with inside delivery
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a craftsman lt1000 48 inch. This takes longer (30 in.) but the suction of a single blade discharges even wet grass into the bagger well. Very manageable, tight turns. Long wheelbase means hilltops get scalped a bit. I cut on the highest setting. I've yet to find a mower that cuts as high as I'd like. Shipping was flawless with inside delivery. Cutting on slopes is a little un-nerving but it works.
customer_reviews.author: nancy dunne,nancy dunne

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tractor! Fairly easy to put together and I say that as I'm female and tried to put it together before family got home as a surprise. But bolts were too tight and needed more muscle. Husband had it put together within 1/2 hour. Have used it 6 times already, starts right up, easy to maneuver and cuts great! Would absolutely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: susan smethurst

customer_reviews.title: Good mower, I recommend it. You get your money's worth in a quality machine
customer_reviews.text: This is a good riding mower. Just, the clutch is jerky, and the shift from forward to reverse is catchy. I have been spoiled by having a hydrostatic transmission on my other mower. But that is rather a pricey option, whereas this is a very reasonably priced machine. Maybe the clutch will wear in over time, and at this price, I must be happy to deal with that catchy shifter.
customer_reviews.author: Norman Elliott

customer_reviews.title: It mulch's and mows very good the turning radius is good and it does have ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this rider because it was one of the very few that would go through my gate. It mulch's and mows very good the turning radius is good and it does have more than enough power,but its not very stable on slops and the controls are very hard to reach and operate, the seat will not move back far enough to be comfortable. All and all for the price and its ability to go through a narrow gate 34" with room to spare its gets 3 Stars
customer_reviews.author: Mark A Young

customer_reviews.title: Troy-Bilt Riding Mower
customer_reviews.text: This 30" mower meets our needs to do trimming around flower beds and trees in our yard, enabling us to avoid using a more time consuming trimmer. It's got of plastic on it rather than all metal like a heavier duty lawn mower. The frame is metal & the blade deck is metal, but the rest is plastic. It turns in a tight radius. If you need a mower to fit around shrubbery or get close to landscaping lumber, this does the job.
customer_reviews.author: UpstateFarmgirl

customer_reviews.title: Received the Troy-Bilt 30-inch riding mower in good shape. It was easy to assemble the few ...
customer_reviews.text: Received the Troy-Bilt 30-inch riding mower in good shape. It was easy to assemble the few parts that needed to be attached. No heavy lifting was involved. Within 20 minutes the mower was ready to work. The mower is perfect for my 1/2 acre of lawn and is gait friendly. No mechanical issues thus far have been found and it functions as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: WILLIAM STAFFELD

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good heavy mower and seems to be doing fine with performance.
customer_reviews.author: wjc

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: sharing this with a neighbor and we both love it. My daughter calls us "handy grannies"
customer_reviews.author: Debra Goldstein

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it just the right size and easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Brannon

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly quick for a decent sized yard with very good maneuverability. Would strongly recommend
customer_reviews.text: It has been about a month now and this mower has worked out perfectly. Surprisingly quick for a decent sized yard with very good maneuverability. Would strongly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Terracciano

customer_reviews.title: turns are good. Nice buy
customer_reviews.text: Only used it once, still trying to get use to the controls. Cuts the grass with ease. turns are good. Nice buy.
customer_reviews.author: kevin mcguigan

customer_reviews.title: Great mower. One bolt was cross threaded on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great mower. One bolt was cross threaded on the tow plate, but got it free with a bit of muscle. Went together pretty easily once I got it off of the pallet.
customer_reviews.author: Hope   Zock

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase glad I got it thru amazon ...
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase glad I got it thru amazon has the better built engine a amazon exclusive. Came well crated up good delivery guys. Me and my wife put it together in a couple of hours. Very easy to do happy mowing
customer_reviews.author: Julio

customer_reviews.title: Great!! Well packedx..........I just wanted to update my info for all.
customer_reviews.text: Great!! Well packed, and dilivered on a timely basis , by professionals. Put the box directly in my garage. Took about an hour to un pack and assemble. Runs great great, was ready to go. Wasn't sure about ordering a item like this from Amazon, but after this expearence would not hesitate to do so in the future. I recently needed a part. No luck getting Troy built to respond. Should be a warranty part, but could not get a response. I did locate a dealer and bought the part out right. Is is a great tractor, just no manufacturer back up.
customer_reviews.author: thomas

customer_reviews.title: Had I known I would have bought one a long time ago
customer_reviews.text: Great little riding mower. Very well made. Assembly was easy. Put in gas and it cranked first turn of the key. As in previous reviews, the forward/reverse shift knob came off first time I shifted from neutral to reverse. No biggie, screwed it back on and tighten it a bit when I shift. Very impressed at the quality of the cut. Smooth and level, my grass looks like when I mow with rear bagging 21" walk behind. This baby cut my mowing time in half! Easy to steer, sharp turning radius, can get very close to fence etc... Purchased the bragger too, real chore installing it but it looks good and works very well. Well engineered and well built.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cotten

customer_reviews.title: Best for the money
customer_reviews.text: Everything it stated. Not great on step inclines but awesome machine.
customer_reviews.author: Dan McNulty

customer_reviews.title: Love this mower
customer_reviews.text: Love this mower! Arrived quickly and well packaged. Drives great, and powers through even the toughest grass! Really enjoy using this machine!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: works great for our yard
customer_reviews.text: works great for our yard. My husband has a medical problem that does not allow for a lot of walking. so far so good. Was easy to put together and delivery went well with all in tact.
customer_reviews.author: Connie S Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: does the job well done and is not a gas hogger
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far it works like a champ. Only one minor glich....the forward/reverse knob keeps coming off.
customer_reviews.author: monica silva

customer_reviews.title: Starts right up every time and is the perfect size for my 1/3 acre property
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. Starts right up every time and is the perfect size for my 1/3 acre property.
customer_reviews.author: Sunsmile

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great small mower for small yards, started right up and out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley Drobot

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: good mower for the price. easy to operate and steer
customer_reviews.author: John Manchisi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase for the price
customer_reviews.text: Still using this years later and have not had any troubles with it . Excellent purchase for the price. Runs like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael R

customer_reviews.title: Affordable - Powerful, fast and spacesaver
customer_reviews.text: I live in the suburbs on a 1/4 acre. I don't need a huge farm machine. I had a large (to me) Sears Craftsman that finally broke down after 20 years. Repairman couldn't fix it. Searching for a new one was tough. The majority of ride-on mowers are over $1,200 and 42". My 2 car garage can't fit a 42" along with our 2 cars. This "little" mower fits in my garage and is surprisingly a powerful and easy to handle. It turns and circles well. I have a steep hill in my backyard. I go up and down with this and it hasn't been an issue. Very Pleased!
customer_reviews.author: L. Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work fine and was what I expected it to be
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work fine and was what I expected it to be. Arrived on time and in good condition. Like!
customer_reviews.author: vernongmiles

customer_reviews.title: Great for small yards.
customer_reviews.text: The Troy-Bilt is great for small yards. Starts and runs great. I did lengthen the shift D-N-R by 4 inches and that worked really well. Much easier to shift. Has a quick turning radius, could surprise you if going full speed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Starts easily, the lawn looks nice, and it rides comfortably. I can recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: runs great, does a good job, I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Cetenich

customer_reviews.title: great mower
customer_reviews.text: I was super impressed with this product, the fast shipping and the time allowed to inspect before I accepted the shipment and of course it mows grass well also.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Q.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent performer.
customer_reviews.text: Very good mower. Easy assembly.. Is exactly what I hoped for
customer_reviews.author: Donald S.

customer_reviews.title: Kewl little tractor
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little tractor:-) getting it shipped here tho was a pain in the butt!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cuts great and well built
customer_reviews.text: Great little yard mower. Not as wide as my recently retired lawn tractor but the increased ability to get into smaller places is worth it. Less need to deal around the push mower to clean up the cutting area. On really nice benefit is the rear mounted engine makes steering a breeze. Almost like driving a chevy corvair for those who remember driving that car. Glad I chose this as my replacement
customer_reviews.author: Paul J. Sgrillo

customer_reviews.title: Great Mower for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, operate and maneuver. The mower cuts well, and much better than the walk-behind I used to have. Nice that it comes with the mulching plug. I have used this for a month now (4 mowings) and no complaints. I do feel some "flexing" over uneven surfaces that another reviewer mentioned - and I hope that is something that doesn't cause problems down the road. For the price, though, you can't really beat this small rider.
customer_reviews.author: Joe B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for our small yard.
customer_reviews.text: My new Troy mower will not stay running. New out of box. Acts like no fuel getting to carburetor. Not a happy camper.👍update took the mower to shop. Mechanic said no gas flowing. All they had to do was blow air through the gas line. No charge!! Got it home test ride good!! Shopped around found a leaf bagger for 250$. Was here 2 days after ordering. Life just got easier. I'll update if any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Lee

customer_reviews.title: nice mower
customer_reviews.text: easy to put together battery not hooked up, cuts well, turns okay six speed very quick great mower for the price
customer_reviews.author: Norby

customer_reviews.title: it is awesome so easy to use and navigate
customer_reviews.text: it is awesome so easy to use and navigate with
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A very good choice.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. Came on a big boxed palletized box. The delivery person put it directly in my garage so i could assemble it. Simple assembly with detailed instructions. You need screwdrivers, 3/8-5/8 wrenches and/or sockets. Assemble in less than a half hour, one hour if you are not familiar with tools. Started first try. Cuts clean and you have a chose of mulching or side chute exit. Only negative, it does not cut in reverse. This is not a big deal to me, but some may find this to be important. Very good mower for a year less than on acre. I would buy again and suggest on to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: T. Rankin

customer_reviews.title: Don't even think about it, buy it now!
customer_reviews.text: After spending a considerable amount of time going over all the reviews and visiting Lowes, Sears and the web, determined that the Amazon deal was the best. No surprises, mower was placed in my garage. It took me longer to unpack it than it took me to get it assembled. After gassing it up, started on the first try. The only question is why did I wait till my 70 year old hips told me to get a riding mower? Don't wait, get this mower now. Perfect for small lawns with lots of trees and a small back gate. Now it's kind of fun to cut the lawn. Also the grand kids are volunteering to cut the grass, imagine that.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Britt

customer_reviews.title: easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery, easy to put together, run good and does the job with ease!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Reed

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this.
customer_reviews.text: This product is useless to me. It does not start reliably, it is under powered, and will not take my 140# body up my septic mound (this is not steep), The front wheels seem to pop to the far right or left of their own volition, and any jarring of the exit chute causes the machine to shut down. To restart you have to get down and unscrew two wing nuts and reinstall the exit chute. It chokes and dies on a bunch of dandelions. On the highest blade setting, *5* it scalps some areas. AND I find it is unreturnable full stop, no excuses. I am not pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy H Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Prior to purchase, I had an idea that this ...
customer_reviews.text: Prior to purchase,I had an idea that this product was cheaply put together. That idea was fully confirmed after it arrived and I used it for the first time. I went for it solely because I didn't want to spend a whole lot of money. Cut grass, it would albeit unequally. Performs very poorly on elevation of any degree.
customer_reviews.author: ITO

product_meta.title: Troy-Bilt 30-Inch Neighborhood Riding Lawn Mower
product_meta.description: The Troy-Bilt Riding Lawn Mower with 30" cutting deck couples the benefits of a standard riding lawn mower with the size of a wide cut walk behind mower. Easily stored in a garage or shed, this neighborhood mower is ideal for standard land owners with a medium sized landscape and relatively even terrain. The powerful Troy-Bilt engine is built to last and provide clean performance. Fuel tank capacity includes a 1.3 gallon tank with a fuel sight window, which allows you to check gas levels. This riding mower features a 5 height adjustable blade with manual power take-off for easy and fast blade engagement. For added comfort, the seat raises to mid-back and the steering wheel is a 13" soft grip weel and the steering column can be adjusted to the preferred height. Troy-Bilt offers a 2-year limited warranty with extensive coverage to give you the durability you should expect.
feature_bullets: This neighborhood mower is ideal for standard land owners with a medium sized landscape and relatively even terrain
Powerful OHV Troy-Bilt Engine with top forward speeds of 4.25 MPH and a 6-speed transmission
Manual power take-off for fast and easy blade engagement
The 30-Inch cutting deck featuring 5 adjustable settings couples the benefits of a standard riding mower with the size of a wide cut walk behind mower
18-Inch turning radius with 13x5-inch front wheels and 16x6.5-inch rear wheels
